incidents.name: [GRA/RBX/SBG/BHS][Collaborative solutions] - Exchange Hosted and Private search feature

incident_updates.body: Our technicians have finished applying the pacth to the private servers. The shared infrastructure is still being patched, but no service interruption is expected.

affected_components.name: Collaborative solutions || Hosted Exchange - Mailbox Access

incident_updates.body: Our technicians apply the patch to the servers gradually and there is a maximum outage of 45 minutes per server.

affected_components.name: Collaborative solutions || Hosted Exchange - Mailbox Access

incident_updates.body: Start time : 14/03/2024 14:00 UTC Service impact : Microsoft Outlook product is facing an issue that prevent clients to perform a search. Application like OWA, ActiveSync are working without impact. We are investingating with Microsoft to identify the root cause of this issue. Ongoing actions : Investigating Workaround : Temporary you can disable the ServerAssistedSearch by creating registry key base on the schema bellow. • Key: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft\Office\16.0\Outlook\Search • Value name: DisableServerAssistedSearch • Value type: REG_DWORD • Value: 1 Please remember that altering registry key require creation of backup and done incorrectly can damage your computer. Thank you for your trust. Security and protection of your data remain our highest priority, and it is in this frame of mind that we have been operating for years.

affected_components.name: Collaborative solutions || Hosted Exchange - Mailbox Access

incident_updates.body: Start time : 14/05/2024 12:00 UTC Service impact : Websites net2ftp.clusterXXX and phpmyadmin.clusterXXX might be unavailable a few minutes on Cluster017/Cluster026/Cluster030. Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are investigating the issue. Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

To work around this issue, download the document, and then use the Microsoft Office desktop applications to view or edit it. 
We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue.
We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue.

Start time : 13/03/2024 00:00 UTC Service impact : Following an mandatory update from Microsoft, adding templates to Exchange-based services and previewing Excel or Word documents is temporarily not functioning on OWA (Outlook on the web). Links for shared calendars is temporarily not functioning. Root cause : Software issue Ongoing actions : We are working with Microsoft to fix this issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.

Start time : 14/05/2024 20:30 UTC End time : 14/05/2024 22:00 UTC Service impact : The filerz will have a downtime of 40min during the migration. Service improvement : We are going to update the filerz below (webhosting server) to a newer and more stable version. The goal of this maintenance is to improve the performance and enhance the security of our infrastructure.

scheduled_maintenances.name: [EU][Web Cloud] - Outlook Web Access mailbox migration

incident_updates.body: Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

affected_components.name: Collaborative solutions || MX Plan - Mailbox Access

incident_updates.body: Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.
We will be undergoing scheduled maintenance during this time.

affected_components.name: Collaborative solutions || MX Plan - Mailbox Access

incident_updates.body: As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Web Cloud offer. Start time : 08/04/2024 16:10 UTC End time : 30/08/2024 16:15 UTC Service impact : Service interruption is expected for a few minutes to a few hours Service improvement : The purpose of this operation is to migrate MXPLAN mailboxes under Outlook Web Access (OWA) to the new Zimbra Webmail. No action is required from the customers. For further information, please find attached a link to the FAQ: https://help.ovhcloud.com/csm/fr-mx-plan-zimbra-faq?id=kb_article_view&sysparm_article=KB0061410 Thank you for your understanding.

affected_components.name: Collaborative solutions || MX Plan - Mailbox Access
